title: [Self-Directed] Machine Learning-Based Practical Training for R/C Column and Pier Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic structural mechanics and civil engineering concepts, with proficiency in essential software like Excel
context.additional_context: Education introducing social studies curriculum design concepts for pre-service and in-service teachers, providing smartphone-centric learning environments in limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Explain basic design principles of R/C columns and piers and compare design differences between rectangular and circular cross-sections
Analysis of efficiency evaluation of machine learning-based design models compared to traditional methods through case studies
Conducting R/C structure design simulations using smartphone apps in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
